name: When Spring Fades
description:
When Spring Fades is an interactive high fantasy flash fiction with an unusual perspective and two possible endings.

Created for the Exilian 2022-2023 Winter Creative Competition. The theme was 'Snowstorm'.

When Spring Fades can be played in ~5-10 minutes and is entirely browser-based to easily fit into your day.

You may need to disable your adblocker to play this game.
